attributes.action: PROSECUTE THE MP'S FOR FRAUDULENTLY OBTAINING MONEY BY DECEPTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the increasing number of MP's paying back monies obtained illegally. Isn't about time that we the public have these criminals prosecuted.

Think carefully, if you were to do the save, not only would your employer sack you, but you would be prosecuted as well.

PAYBACK TIME!!!

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
